name: SQSRedrivePolicy
description: The RedrivePolicy type is a property of the AWS::SQS::Queue resource.

properties.name: deadLetterTargetArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dead letter queue to which the messages are sent to after the maxReceiveCount value has been exceeded.

properties.name: maxReceiveCount
properties.description: The number of times a message is delivered to the source queue before being sent to the dead letter queue.
